PREFATORY NOTE

Tm: need for a new edition of this volume allows me to correct some misprints and mistakes in the text and translation. I am gratified to reviewers for pointing out a few that I had not noticed myself. Some of the mistakes of nomenclature were due 'to the plan of publication, which precluded postponing Book I, Pliny's Table of Contents, till the whole ofthe treatise had been worked through and the objects mentioned had been so far as possible identified by his

descriptions. H. R.

October, 1943.
